rules.version_control_required: All controlled documents display document number, revision number, effective date, and approval signatures. Documents are uniquely identifiable and version-controlled to prevent use of obsolete information.
rules.obsolete_removal_mandatory: Obsolete documents are immediately removed from all points of use upon revision. Obsolete documents retained for reference are clearly marked 'OBSOLETE - REFERENCE ONLY' and stored separately from current documents.
rules.external_document_control: External documents including regulatory requirements, customer specifications, and industry standards are controlled to ensure the latest version is available and used. External documents are reviewed annually for currency.
rules.master_document_list: A master document list is maintained identifying all controlled documents, their current revision status, and distribution locations. The list is updated whenever documents are created, revised, or obsoleted.
rules.approval_before_use: Documents are reviewed and approved by authorized personnel before use. Approval authority is defined by position/role and documented in the document control procedure.
rules.distribution_controlled: Document distribution is controlled to ensure relevant personnel have access to current versions. Distribution lists are maintained and updated when organizational changes occur.
rules.change_management: Document changes are managed through a formal review and approval process. Significant changes are communicated to affected personnel through training or documented notification.
rules.electronic_document_backup: Electronic documents are backed up regularly and protected against unauthorized modification. Access controls ensure only authorized personnel can edit controlled documents.
rules.retention_policy_established: Document and record retention periods are defined based on regulatory requirements, customer requirements, and business needs. Minimum retention is 2 years unless otherwise specified.
rules.periodic_review_required: All controlled documents are reviewed at least every 3 years to ensure continued relevance and accuracy. Review dates are tracked and overdue reviews flagged for management attention.
